19g PROTEIN
Pre-Workout

PROTEIN ENERGY BALLS

Power-packed energy balls with dates, nuts, and protein powder. 19g protein for pre or post-workout fuel.

19g
Protein
175
Calories
10m
Total Time
18
Yield

Nutrition per 2 balls

Carbs20g
Fat8g
Fiber3g
Sugar12g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 200g medjool dates, pitted
  • 100g almonds
  • 60g vanilla whey protein powder
  • 30g unsweetened cocoa powder
  • 30ml water
  • 2g sea salt

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Blend Base

Process dates and almonds in a food processor until finely chopped.

2

Add Protein

Add protein powder, cocoa, salt, and water. Blend until sticky.

3

Form Balls

Roll into 18 balls.

4

Optional Coating

Roll in shredded coconut or cocoa powder if desired.

5

Chill

Refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.

PRO TIPS

ðŸ’¡

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

ðŸ’¡

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

ðŸ’¡

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
